name: places/ChIJhej6OvpYwokRRPccp1MvYFM
formattedAddress: 27 W 55th St #1, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 27 W 55th St #1, New York, NY 10019-4909, USA

originalText.text:
Had the joy of visiting Dr Kaplan for a filling a couple of years ago. Gave me a price before setting the appointment and then while he had me locked in the chair full of utensils in my mouth he “suddenly realized” he will have to do another procedure that will add a thousand dollars to the price. Obviously I couldn’t say no and I was shocked when I left. This was almost 10 years ago and my bite hasn’t been the same since. I can’t properly close my mouth anymore. All thanks to this wonderful office of crooks.
I also find it fishy that his reviews only go back one year. What does that tell you when he's been around for ages?  Stay away!

originalText.text: Dr Kaplan and his dream team of Alla (hygienist) and Ruth (office manager) are top notch. Dr K is the dentist that other dentists seek out. Fastidious, sensitive, up on the latest technologies. He has saved many a tooth for me, my son and husband. Plus the kindest people on the planet. Cannot recommend more highly — wish there were more stars.

originalText.text: Dr Kaplan is a wonderful dentist. He is meticulous about his work, gives thorough explanations of what he is doing and why he is doing it it, and is empathic and concerned about his patients. He is always willing to go the extra mile for a patient by coming in early, accommodating to their schedules, and even coming into the office on a non-scheduled day in an emergency.

originalText.text: Fabulous dentist and hygienist.  Been a client for 30 years. Dr. Kaplan has saved many of my teeth!

text.text: Fabulous dentist and hygienist.  Been a client for 30 years. Dr. Kaplan has saved many of my teeth!

originalText.text: There is no dentist in the world like Dr. Kaplan. His work is superb and lasts a lifetime!!!!
